answers.answer: I don't know the specifics, but the FDA did just contraindicate Tekturna in patients with kidney impairment or diabetes when taking ARBs and ACEIs. If you meet these conditions, you may want to talk to your doc.Source:http://www.newsinferno.com/pharmaceuticals/tekturna-label-changes-valturna-market-withdrawal-announced-by-novartis/36884

question: What kind of renal problems have been noted with Tekturna?
title: Tekturna
